While most four-year olds are playing with toy motorbikes,...
...incredibly Tima Kuleshov is already riding them.
And his fastest bike can go an impressive 45 miles an hour.
He started riding a bicycle before he was two-years old...
Just a few months later, he began to ride motorbikes.
And by the time he was three and a half,...
...he was taking part in children's competitions in Russia.
His proud parents Alexander and Victoria...
...say that he has no competitors in his native Ukraine.
But despite his success, he doesn't brag.
In fact, he often doesn't even tell people that he rides motorbikes.
